value:
Odor of Heroes... Why is it you say
this thing? Do Heroes smell like
slop from farm?

We are not teacher at heart, but
in other world, we have been tutor
of the hacking and slashing.

Always you are busy. Always, never
sleep enough. You lay head on
fluffy pillow. We do patrol for you.

What are these Heroes? Are
Heroes us or fancy people in white
uniforms like silly ducks?

People of this kingdom are under
attack by empire. We help.
Any good person would.

In home country, we have expression.
Blue means blue, but blue is deep
color. Holds all other blues.$k$pNow, you think on that.

We are grateful. And we always
repay debt.

You call Athena? We are warrior,
not little child to come running.
Still, you are nice. We stay.

We understand many of your
fancy words now.$k$pSummon is how you call Heroes
like you do.$k$pBreidablik is funny weapon.
Divine, divine—we know.$k$pAnd shoot is to shoot. Even
little babies know that.$k$pWe are grateful for patience
you give us.$k$pThere is a saying in home country,
that true warriors in group fight
as one body with many arms.$k$pSo, we help allies, and we give
our two arms gladly.$k$pNow, final word we have learned.
We are your, how do you say
again...? Woman?$k$pWait, no. Friend. We are your
friend. And we hope to learn many
more words from you.
Is that hello in home country?
I try speak your tongue, but is twisted.
Half things people say sound like curse words. I know not. But sound like!
This Odor of Heroes... Why not they just take bath, if smell?
We pledge self to you for life. Is least we can do.
